name: Where Am I? (mgadomski)
description: A game in which your character is trapped in a castle with dark secrets. Your main goal is to find the key and the door, which appears in a different place every time you start the game. During the adventure you will face monsters placed in the castle, and you will be helped by chests and objects scattered all over the place. You can use different combinations of items to fight. If you want, use two weapons at the same time or a shield and one weapon. Your character can also use magic to attack and heal himself. You have dice in your inventory, which you can scatter underneath you by marking checkpoints. In the castle you will also find letters showing the stories of the place and your character.
